Package uno.anahata.asi.model.tool

Class AbstractTool<P extends AbstractToolParameter,C extends AbstractToolCall>

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.AbstractTool<P,C>
Type Parameters:
P - The specific subclass of AbstractToolParameter this tool uses.
C - The specific subclass of AbstractToolCall this tool creates.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadTool, JavaMethodTool
public abstract class AbstractTool<P extends AbstractToolParameter,C extends AbstractToolCall> extends Object
The abstract base class for a tool, now generic on its Parameter and Call types.
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_RETENTION_TURNS

      public static final int DEFAULT_RETENTION_TURNS
      The default retention policy for tool calls, in number of user turns.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • name

      @NonNull protected final @NonNull String name
      The fully qualified name of the tool, e.g., "LocalFiles.readFile". This is immutable.

    • description

      protected String description
      A detailed description of what the tool does.

    • toolkit

      protected AbstractToolkit toolkit
      A reference to the parent toolkit that owns this tool. Can be null for standalone tools.

    • permission

      protected ToolPermission permission
      The user's configured preference for this tool, determining its execution behavior.

    • responseJsonSchema

      protected String responseJsonSchema
      A pre-generated, language-agnostic JSON schema for the tool's return type. Can be null for void methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractTool

      protected AbstractTool(@NonNull @NonNull String name)

  • Method Details

    • createCall

      public abstract C createCall(AbstractModelMessage message, String id, Map<String,Object> args)
      Factory method to create a tool-specific call object from raw model data.
      Parameters:
      message - the model message the call will belong to.
      id - The call ID.
      args - The raw arguments from the model.
      Returns:
      A new tool call instance.

    • getResponseType

      public abstract Type getResponseType()
      Template method hook for subclasses to provide their specific Response type.
      Returns:
      The reflection Type of the corresponding AbstractToolResponse subclass.

    • getTokenCount

      public int getTokenCount()
      Calculates the total token count of this tool on-the-fly. The count is a provider-agnostic approximation of the token overhead, calculated by summing the tokens in its description, response schema, and all of its parameters.
      Returns:
      The total token count.
